name: alternate-node-red-installer
description: An alternative installer for Node-RED. Avoids global installs, no admin rights required.

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Patch version bump to %s"
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Minor version bump to %s"
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Major version bump to %s"
scripts.win-tag: git tag -a v%npm_package_version% -m "Release v%npm_package_version%"; git push origin --tags
scripts.tag: git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push origin --tags
